text: Mu by’ukuri mwagize urugero rwiza kuri Ibrahim n’abari kumwe nawe, ubwo babwiraga abantu babo bati “Rwose twitandukanyije namwe ndetse n’ibyo mugaragira bitari Allah. Turabahakanye, kandi hagati yacu namwe havutse ububisha n’ubugome bihoraho, kugeza ubwo muzemera Allah wenyine.” Uretse imvugo ya Ibrahim abwira se ati “Rwose nzagusabira imbabazi (kuri Allah), ariko nta bushobozi mfite bwo kugira icyo nkumarira imbere ya Allah.” (Basabye Nyagasani bagira bati) ‘Nyagasani wacu! Ni Wowe twiringiye kandi ni nawe twicuzaho ndetse iwawe ni ho garukiro (ryacu twese)’
